name: 30 Day 2D Shooter Practice Project
description:
Practice project created in 30 (non-consecutive) days

Solo project (design, programming, art, animations and sounds; for music and font please see below)


Credits

Thank you everyone who helped test the game and gave feedback!
With special thanks to Michał W. (who provided feedback almost daily) and Krzysztof (for valuable art and audio feedback) - you guys rock!

Music from https://filmmusic.io "RetroFuture Dirty" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com) License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Font used: Austra-Lite

Hotfix 1.01 (thanks Cornel for pointing those issues out!)

  • Fixed game name in main menu
  • Time no longer start on level load but after closing main manu
  • Fixed 'Bullet Energy' description in upgrades
  • Enemies should avoid obstacles better
